definition: to fight/to combat/to seize/(of heart) to beat
abbr. for the Big Dipper constellation 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1]
to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together
dry measure for grain equal to ten 升[sheng1] or one-tenth of a 石[dan4]/decaliter/peck/cup or dipper shaped object/old variant of 陡[dou3]

sentences.english: Bitch fought with the cheetah mortal combat to protect the young.
sentences.chinese: 母狼为了保护幼崽同猎豹展开了殊死的搏斗。

sentences.english: And bears have been duking it out for centuries.
sentences.chinese: 牛与熊之间的搏斗已经持续了几个世纪。

sentences.english: After a fight, Max, but maggie off the killer was hijacked in go.
sentences.chinese: 经过一场搏斗，马克斯干掉了杀手，但玛吉却被劫走。

sentences.english: "Maybe they were fighting, " study leader Lambert said.
sentences.chinese: 领导学者兰伯特认为“或许他们曾展开生死搏斗”。

sentences.english: Startles between greatly, Lv Liuliang's illusory image held the sword to rush comes, fights with him.
sentences.chinese: 大骇之间，吕留良的幻影已持剑冲上前来，与他搏斗。

sentences.english: He was grappling with an alligator in a lagoon.
sentences.chinese: 他正在环礁湖里与一只短吻鳄搏斗。

sentences.english: Our soldiers grappled with the enemy at close range .
sentences.chinese: 我们的战士和敌人短兵相接地搏斗。

sentences.english: Going up the steep slope involved a fresh round of hand-to-leaf combat.
sentences.chinese: 在这个陡峭的山坡上，我又要与树叶进行搏斗。

sentences.english: When the ruffians attacked him, he laid about them vigorously.
sentences.chinese: 当歹徒攻击他时，他奋勇地跟他们搏斗。

sentences.english: Female bear will fight angrily if she found that her kids threatened.
sentences.chinese: 雌熊会很生气地搏斗，如果发现他的孩子受到威胁。

sentences.english: They were buffeting with the waves.
sentences.chinese: 他们当时正在与波浪搏斗。

sentences.english: As long every man exists-there is some need of him; let him fight for his own.
sentences.chinese: 只消人保存，就有一些须要，让他为本身去搏斗吧。

sentences.english: During the fight he was knifed in the back.
sentences.chinese: 搏斗时，他背上被刺了一刀。

sentences.english: The winning photo captures the ferocity of a spring-time fight between two cock pheasants.
sentences.chinese: 获奖照片抓拍到两只雄雉在春季搏斗的激烈场面。

sentences.english: I struggled with him for the knife.
sentences.chinese: 我与他为了争夺那把刀而搏斗。

definition: to fight or argue on a blogging site (netspeak)
to grapple (with the enemy)/to fight at the risk of one's life
to tear at (with the teeth, like one animal attacking another)
lit. short-weaponed soldiery fight one another (idiom); fierce hand-to-hand infantry combat/to fight at close quarters
to fight with all one has
to go all out for sth at risk of one's life
